         <th aria-label="True Shooting Percentage" data-stat="ts_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>True Shooting Percentage</strong><br>A measure of shooting efficiency that takes into account 2-point field goals, 3-point field goals, and free throws." >TS%</th>
         <th aria-label="3-Point Attempt Rate" data-stat="fg3a_per_fga_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>3-Point Attempt Rate</strong><br>Percentage of FG Attempts from 3-Point Range" >3PAr</th>
         <th aria-label="Free Throw Attempt Rate" data-stat="fta_per_fga_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<strong>Free Throw Attempt Rate</strong><br>Number of FT Attempts Per FG Attempt" >FTr</th>
         <th aria-label="Offensive Rebound Percentage" data-stat="orb_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Offensive Rebound Percentage</b><br>An estimate of the percentage of available offensive rebounds a player grabbed while he was on the floor." >ORB%</th>
         <th aria-label="Defensive Rebound Percentage" data-stat="drb_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Defensive Rebound Percentage</b><br>An estimate of the percentage of available defensive rebounds a player grabbed while he was on the floor." >DRB%</th>
         <th aria-label="Total Rebound Percentage" data-stat="trb_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Total Rebound Percentage</b><br>An estimate of the percentage of available rebounds a player grabbed while he was on the floor." >TRB%</th>
         <th aria-label="Assist Percentage" data-stat="ast_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Assist Percentage</b><br>An estimate of the percentage of teammate field goals a player assisted while he was on the floor." >AST%</th>

         <th aria-label="Block Percentage" data-stat="blk_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Block Percentage</b><br>An estimate of the percentage of opponent two-point field goal attempts blocked by the player while he was on the floor." >BLK%</th>
         <th aria-label="Turnover Percentage" data-stat="tov_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip sort_default_asc center" data-tip="<b>Turnover Percentage</b><br>An estimate of turnovers committed per 100 plays." >TOV%</th>
         <th aria-label="Usage Percentage" data-stat="usg_pct" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Usage Percentage</b><br>An estimate of the percentage of team plays used by a player while he was on the floor." >USG%</th>
         <th aria-label=" " data-stat="ws-dum" scope="col" class=" poptip center" > </th>
         <th aria-label="Offensive Win Shares" data-stat="ows" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Offensive Win Shares</b><br>An estimate of the number of wins contributed by a player due to his offense." >OWS</th>
         <th aria-label="Defensive Win Shares" data-stat="dws" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Defensive Win Shares</b><br>An estimate of the number of wins contributed by a player due to his defense." >DWS</th>
         <th aria-label="Win Shares" data-stat="ws" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Win Shares</b><br>An estimate of the number of wins contributed by a player." >WS</th>
         <th aria-label="Win Shares Per 48 Minutes" data-stat="ws_per_48" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Win Shares Per 48 Minutes</b><br>An estimate of the number of wins contributed by a player per 48 minutes (league average is approximately .100)" >WS/48</th>
         <th aria-label=" " data-stat="bpm-dum" scope="col" class=" poptip center" > </th>
         <th aria-label="OBPM" data-stat="obpm" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Offensive Box Plus/Minus</b><br>A box score estimate of the offensive points per 100 possessions a player contributed above a league-average player, translated to an average team." >OBPM</th>
         <th aria-label="DBPM" data-stat="dbpm" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Defensive Box Plus/Minus</b><br>A box score estimate of the defensive points per 100 possessions a player contributed above a league-average player, translated to an average team." >DBPM</th>
         <th aria-label="BPM" data-stat="bpm" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Box Plus/Minus</b><br>A box score estimate of the points per 100 possessions a player contributed above a league-average player, translated to an average team." >BPM</th>
         <th aria-label="VORP" data-stat="vorp" scope="col" class=" poptip center" data-tip="<b>Value over Replacement Player</b><br>A box score estimate of the points per 100 TEAM possessions that a player contributed above a replacement-level (-2.0) player, translated to an average team and prorated to an 82-game season.<br><br>Multiply by 2.70 to convert to wins over replacement." >VORP</th>

	<h1>Page Not Found (404 error)</h1>
        
          
      
      
      
      
      
         
            <div class="section_wrapper" id="all_8610575246">    <div class="section_content" id="div_8610575246">
<p>We apologize, but we could not find the page requested by your device.</p>

<p>This could be for one of many reasons.
<ul class="bullets">
<li>We accidentally linked to the wrong page.</li>
<li>We removed a page that was no longer necessary.</li>
<li>Someone put a link from their website to our site that was incorrect.</li>
<li>If you typed in the address, it may have been mistyped.</li>
<li>Gremlins.</li>
</ul>

<p>To find what you are looking for you could.

<p><a class="button" href="#header">Use the site search box at the top of the page</a>,
<a class="button" href="/">Visit our HomePage</a>, or
<a class="button" href="#site_menu_link">See the full site index below</a>.

<p>We try to track all error pages as they come up, but you can also:

<p><a class="button" href="//www.sports-reference.com/feedback/">Report an issue with our site</a></p>

	<h1>Page Not Found (404 error)</h1>
        
          
      
      
      
      
      
         
            <div class="section_wrapper" id="all_8610575246">    <div class="section_content" id="div_8610575246">
<p>We apologize, but we could not find the page requested by your device.</p>

<p>This could be for one of many reasons.
<ul class="bullets">
<li>We accidentally linked to the wrong page.</li>
<li>We removed a page that was no longer necessary.</li>
<li>Someone put a link from their website to our site that was incorrect.</li>
<li>If you typed in the address, it may have been mistyped.</li>
<li>Gremlins.</li>
</ul>

<p>To find what you are looking for you could.

<p><a class="button" href="#header">Use the site search box at the top of the page</a>,
<a class="button" href="/">Visit our HomePage</a>, or
<a class="button" href="#site_menu_link">See the full site index below</a>.

<p>We try to track all error pages as they come up, but you can also:

<p><a class="button" href="//www.sports-reference.com/feedback/">Report an issue with our site</a></p>

	<h1>Page Not Found (404 error)</h1>
        
          
      
      
      
      
      
         
            <div class="section_wrapper" id="all_8610575246">    <div class="section_content" id="div_8610575246">
<p>We apologize, but we could not find the page requested by your device.</p>

<p>This could be for one of many reasons.
<ul class="bullets">
<li>We accidentally linked to the wrong page.</li>
<li>We removed a page that was no longer necessary.</li>
<li>Someone put a link from their website to our site that was incorrect.</li>
<li>If you typed in the address, it may have been mistyped.</li>
<li>Gremlins.</li>
</ul>

<p>To find what you are looking for you could.

<p><a class="button" href="#header">Use the site search box at the top of the page</a>,
<a class="button" href="/">Visit our HomePage</a>, or
<a class="button" href="#site_menu_link">See the full site index below</a>.

<p>We try to track all error pages as they come up, but you can also:

<p><a class="button" href="//www.sports-reference.com/feedback/">Report an issue with our site</a></p>
